[[User:Krupolskiy Anonim]] [[User:YMS]] [[User:ಶಿವಕುಮಾರ್ ನಾಯಕ್]] [[User:Hibm98]] [[User:GAllegre]] [[User:Epìdosis]] [[User:Jklamo]] [[User:David1010]] [[User:SR5]] [[User:Máté]] [[User:Ślimaczek]] [[User:HakanIST]] [[User:FocalPoint]] [[User:Allen4names]] [[User:Mbch331]] [[User:Zygimantus]] [[User:Fnielsen]] [[User:Peppepz]] [[User:Geraki]] [[User:Supaplex]] [[User:Thierry Caro]] [[User:NMaia]] [[User:Loischantada]] [[User:ANDROBETA]] [[User:Marklar2007]] [[User:Kikos]] [[User:Raid5]] [[User:Doostdar]] [[User:Palapa]] [[User:Octahedron80]] [[User:Милан Јелисавчић]] [[User:Frokor]] [[User:Rippitippi]] [[User:Conny]] [[User:Qllach]] [[User:Miguillen]] [[User:יונה בנדלאק]] [[User:Liuxinyu970226]] [[User:桂鷺淵]] [[User:Bjankuloski06]] [[User:Thomas11]] [[User:Ayack]] [[User:Чаховіч Уладзіслаў]] [[User:Александр Сигачёв]] [[User:Jc86035|Jc86035]] ([[User talk:Jc86035|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 10:41, 4 November 2018 (UTC)

</small>
*Eventually, but maybe we should have the discussion at one place: [[Wikidata:Property_proposal/demonym_of]]. --- [[User talk:Jura1|Jura]] 12:00, 4 November 2018 (UTC)
*: Oh, I didn't realize there was already such a proposal. [[User:Jc86035|Jc86035]] ([[User talk:Jc86035|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 14:56, 4 November 2018 (UTC)

I would like to note that the property is used as label for {{p|27}} at huwiki. If the property is deleted, the current data needs to be imported into the newly accepted structure, and huwiki needs to be notified to create a workaround to the new structure if possible. Ideally, the new structure should make it possible. – [[User:Máté|Máté]] ([[User talk:Máté|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 12:10, 4 November 2018 (UTC)
:This is also the case for WD powered templates at svwiki, frwiki and probably many more. /[[User:Autom|Autom]] ([[User talk:Autom|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 13:13, 4 November 2018 (UTC)

:: {{reply to|Máté|Autom}} Where is it used on huwiki/svwiki/frwiki? Those are not listed in the box on the talk page, perhaps the script which looks for property usage can be improved. {{reply to|Jc86035}} Please notify the projects using this property too. - [[User:Nikki|Nikki]] ([[User talk:Nikki|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 14:52, 4 November 2018 (UTC)
::: {{reply to|Nikki}} [[:hu:Sablon:Személy infobox]] of the top of my head. – [[User:Máté|Máté]] ([[User talk:Máté|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 14:58, 4 November 2018 (UTC)

:::: {{reply to|Nikki}} On svwp, it is used by the module [[:sv:Modul:Wikidata2|Wikidata2]], which in invoked by a lot of templates (like [[:sv:Mall:Faktamall biografi WD|Faktamall biografi WD]] in biografies). I know frwiki had a similar system a year ago (it's possible it has change since then). /[[User:Autom|Autom]] ([[User talk:Autom|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 18:25, 4 November 2018 (UTC)

:::::{{ping|Autom}} Do you have any specific place where this spcific property is used on svwiki? I see ''many'' potential problems with this property in the Swedish language, so at least I have never tried to use or even edit it. [[User:Sextvå.tvånoll.ettsjunoll.sjufyra|Sextvå.tvånoll.ettsjunoll.sjufyra]] ([[User talk:Sextvå.tvånoll.ettsjunoll.sjufyra|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 17:03, 19 April 2019 (UTC)

::::::{{ping|Sextvå.tvånoll.ettsjunoll.sjufyra}} It is used to display nationality in [[:sv:Mall:Faktamall biografi WD|Faktamall biografi WD]] (via [[:sv:Modul:Wikidata2|Wikidata2]]). In the article [[:sv:Bill Gates|Bill Gates]], the template does not return "USA" but "Amerikan", which is the value of {{P|1549}} [{{Q|1305037}}, {{Q|110786}}] of {{Q|30}} (the {{P|27}} of {{Q|5284}}). /[[User:Autom|Autom]] ([[User talk:Autom|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 14:11, 20 April 2019 (UTC)
* {{Vote_delete}} but probably wait some weeks/months until Lexemes are more stable. Cdlt, [[User:VIGNERON|VIGNERON]] ([[User talk:VIGNERON|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 12:17, 4 November 2018 (UTC)

* I agree that we should eventually replace the existing property with lexemes, but we shouldn't delete this until people are able to switch to using lexemes. We still need to decide how we want to link things together. - [[User:Nikki|Nikki]] ([[User talk:Nikki|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 14:52, 4 November 2018 (UTC)

* {{Vote_delete}} The property {{P|6271}} has been created. This one can now be deleted (first declare obsolete, move content, then delete).--[[User:Micru|Micru]] ([[User talk:Micru|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 17:30, 19 December 2018 (UTC)

* {{comment}} If this property is being used in an infobox or by a Lua module, it will need to be retained and to go on having its values added to and extended, at least and until such time as inverse property values become obtainable via Lua - as at present they are not. [[User:Jheald|Jheald]] ([[User talk:Jheald|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 18:09, 19 December 2018 (UTC)

* {{hold}}. I agree with [[User:Jheald|Jheald]] that we need a place -> demonym property to keep infoboxes working. We should keep this property until we have a new Item -> Lexeme "demonym" property, migrate all existing uses and infoboxes, then delete P1549. [[User:Deryck Chan|Deryck Chan]] ([[User talk:Deryck Chan|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 15:52, 11 January 2019 (UTC)

* {{vd}} Very barely used, and replacement is even available for these not more than 100 usages. --[[User:Liuxinyu970226|Liuxinyu970226]] ([[User talk:Liuxinyu970226|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 12:44, 16 March 2019 (UTC)

* {{hold}}. Until infoboxes (as happens in cawiki) can be transformed after have access via LUA module. Thanks, [[User:Amadalvarez|Amadalvarez]] ([[User talk:Amadalvarez|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 12:47, 26 March 2019 (UTC)

* {{comment}}. As noted, 1) there is no wikibase client for lexemes, 2) there is no Lua function available for backlinks or API queries, pending of [[phab:T185313]] that it seems silently declined for a year now. There is not any path from a wiki page like [[:w:fr:Paris]] to reach {{L|26359}}. If these blockers are solved, there are still some concerns. How to deal with {{L|26359}} or {{L|25620}}? How to obtain the demonym for a given language and a lexical category? At the end, it will be one more, or several, arbitrary access and it is expensive in Lua time usage that has limitations in infoboxes powered by Wikidata. --[[User:Vriullop|Vriullop]] ([[User talk:Vriullop|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 07:52, 27 March 2019 (UTC)
* {{Keep}} Keep this property because with this property is very easy to add some data. --[[User:Manu1400|Manu1400]] ([[User talk:Manu1400|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 21:43, 18 August 2019 (UTC)
* {{Keep}} Very helpful, easy to use. [[User:HarryNº2|HarryNº2]] ([[User talk:HarryNº2|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 12:07, 19 November 2019 (UTC)
* {{Keep}} Useful. --[[User:Obsuser|Obsuser]] ([[User talk:Obsuser|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 14:14, 25 November 2019 (UTC)

*{{Neutral}} {{Keep}} How to call an inhabitant of a neighborhood? We must also think of other languages. Nothing can replace it, for the moment. Examples: Germanopratin in {{Q|604717}}, Planpalistain in {{Q|2546289}}. —[[User:Eihel|Eihel]] ([[User talk:Eihel|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 09:59, 26 November 2019 (UTC)

**{{ping|HarryNº2|Obsuser}} Please do not just [[w:WP:USEFUL|say "keep"]] for things that are under deletion discussions as simple and confusing "useful", {{P|5130}} (landmass) was also useful until we have consensus for its deletion. --[[User:Liuxinyu970226|Liuxinyu970226]] ([[User talk:Liuxinyu970226|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 15:09, 28 November 2019 (UTC)
:{{vd}} Doesn't useful, replacement available. --[[Special:Contributions/2409:8902:9001:6CE0:781B:941D:E99A:2367|2409:8902:9001:6CE0:781B:941D:E99A:2367]] 00:16, 4 December 2019 (UTC)
*{{Keep}} Used in Wikipedias, no replacement for infoboxes seems to be available. [[User:Michael FV|Michael FV]] ([[User talk:Michael FV|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 03:00, 9 January 2020 (UTC)

*:{{ping|Manu1400|HarryNº2|Obsuser|Eihel|Michael FV}} Why do you all can't agree with {{P|6271}} as replacement? --[[User:Liuxinyu970226|Liuxinyu970226]] ([[User talk:Liuxinyu970226|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 00:34, 10 January 2020 (UTC)

*::I already put a comment on my opinion [[User:Liuxinyu970226|Liuxinyu970226]], so I return 2 questions to you: How to assemble ''planpalistain'' with {{Q|Q2546289}} since ''planpalalistain'' does not exist? How to add {{Q|604717}} in {{Q|3104247}} without this page appearing in [[Wikidata:Database reports/Constraint violations/P6271]]? With {{P|1549}}, it's possible without error. —[[User:Eihel|Eihel]] ([[User talk:Eihel|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 01:48, 10 January 2020 (UTC)
*::: Opinion changed —[[User:Eihel|Eihel]] ([[User talk:Eihel|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 06:18, 2 March 2021 (UTC)
*{{Keep}}: it is used in too many places and its replacement is immature. [[User:Palotabarát|Palotabarát]] ([[User talk:Palotabarát|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 23:57, 26 January 2020 (UTC)

*{{vd}}: With {{P|6271}} we have now a good option to link from lexeme senses to locality items and since the items work without demonyms, but the words/lexemes are literally filled with sense, the connection should come from that end. --[[User:CamelCaseNick|CamelCaseNick]] ([[User talk:CamelCaseNick|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 01:41, 22 February 2020 (UTC)

*{{Keep}}: I think this one is very simple to maintain. I didnt very much understand the point for suppression? *:Too complicated to query both Qid and Lexemes.Infobox should be looking only on Qid not on lexemes. [[User:Bouzinac|Bouzinac]] ([[User talk:Bouzinac|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 09:45, 25 June 2020 (UTC)
:{{vd}} Replacement available. --[[Special:Contributions/111.32.68.231|111.32.68.231]] 02:35, 9 May 2020 (UTC)

* {{vd}} Having the information on the country makes country items that are already quite big bigger. The information is much better stored as sense. [[User:ChristianKl|'''ChristianKl''']] ❪[[User talk:ChristianKl|✉]]❫ 21:32, 18 May 2020 (UTC)

* {{Keep}}: Designating the inhabitants of a place by a specific name can be useful. Otherwise should we replace it with a longer expression ? [[User:Cquoi|Cquoi]] ([[User talk:Cquoi|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 10:49, 7 June 2020 (UTC)

* {{hold}} : the comments of [[User:Jheald|Jheald]] and [[User:Vriullop|Vriullop]] sound pretty relevant to me, there are blocking points, so keep it for now. --[[User:FoeNyx|FoeNyx]] ([[User talk:FoeNyx|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 23:13, 15 November 2020 (UTC)
* {{Keep}} useful to designate inhabitants of a place. [[User:PAC2|PAC2]] ([[User talk:PAC2|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 20:05, 10 January 2021 (UTC)

* {{Keep}} Using lexeme senses is a poor replacement since there will be one claim per language instead, severely bloating the item. It's better that the sense links to an item like we do today. [[User:Ainali|Ainali]] ([[User talk:Ainali|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 15:15, 12 February 2021 (UTC)

* {{Keep}} Extremely useful when translating label, descriptions, including in wikipedia templates.--[[User:Mikey641|Mikey641]] ([[User talk:Mikey641|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 02:04, 9 March 2021 (UTC)

*{{Vote keep}} This is good for Wikidata but bad for infoboxes: Inverse properties is problematic, since is harder to code templates or modules to emulate the expected behaviour with inverse properties, and most of the nominators of those deletion request don't even address the problems that leads this deletions. One of the warnings says clearly: :
[[File:Skull and Crossbones.svg|25x25px]] Validate the property isn't being used in other projects (using {{[[Template:ExternalUse|ExternalUse]]}}) : and if it is leave a message in Village pump of those projects!
and this is an obvious case of potential use, and as this is already used, this request should be speedy closed. This should be discussed on other projects like Wikipedia first! --[[User:Amitie 10g|Amitie 10g]] ([[User talk:Amitie 10g|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 17:46, 15 July 2021 (UTC)

* {{keep}} Nouns of countries are usually well known, Gentilés could be a question. I cannot understand how "Gentilé of" would help to find the gentilé of a country or a place. --[[User:Pa2chant.bis|Pa2chant.bis]] ([[User talk:Pa2chant.bis|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 07:35, 15 September 2021 (UTC)
